title: November 2018 social media posts
html_content:
Troll disclosure: Some events in this article take place from October through December 2018, when the Teen Troon Squad had access to Chris's CWCSonichu Twitter account and posted several tweets without his knowledge or consent. Tweets covered on this page may or may not be written by Chris.

For more information, see 2018 Twitter account compromise.

Chris's recent failings have helped CWCki gather more information for this article.
Be a winner by adding this information in.


This page is an archive of Chris's major social media posts during November 2018. Posts are sorted by date. Notable comments are included and color-coded for reference.

Contents

  • 1 Kittens
  • 2 Begging
  • 3 Help the kittens
  • 4 Animal control calls
  • 5 Liza adopted
  • 6 Leaking of All Star masturbation clip
  • 7 Chris embracing his inner Amy's Baking Company
  • 8 Magi-Chan sayz
  • 9 Merge Sperg
  • 10 Raw Dump

Kittens

2 November 2018

Main article: Magi-Chan Tweets#Kittens

Begging

2 November 2018

I Just Need Money; ASAP.

Help the kittens

2 November 2018

Please help my kittens! I will NOT get any of this money the food and medicine will be delivered to me! https://twitter.com/SonichuMerch/status/1058488939659644928

Animal control calls

2 November 2018

Oh, People. Did I Not tell all of you to Not Contact Animal Control? Because we‚Äôve just had a visitor who came to check on us! Good Grief!

Liza adopted

4 November 2018

Also, I would like to add; Captain got me in touch with someone I used to know from The End Games. She adopted The Orange Kitten, Liza, after having tea and good conversation with my mother and I. I hope Her Son enjoys his new kitten!

Leaking of All Star masturbation clip

18 November 2018

Tweet later deleted.[1]

This is how chris pays tribute to his lovers

- The guy in the "bluegras state"

You lose farms!

[clip from All Star uploaded]

Chris embracing his inner Amy's Baking Company

They are MY CATS! I am their MOTHER! Why can't you just leave me alone? I love and care for each and every one of Them!

Magi-Chan sayz

And Magi-Chan made those money-requesting Tweets yesterday, on our behalf.


Merge Sperg

Part Four: Post-Merge

And now, what will be After the Dimensional Merge, and everything has settled down? All buildings, objects, and individual people and creatures have been successfully brought together, of those what and who are meant to be, anyway.

  1. DimensionalMerge
Very likely, Everyone will be able to return to their homes. But those whose homes have been altered by one dimension or the other's building, even on the possibility of moving back in with a (super)Hero(es), Anti-Hero, Villain, or yours or someone else's self-counterpart,...
The best and sound thing to do in the meantime is to move back into the one home together, regardless of Government-Regulated occupancies of the building. If need be, you all are more than capable of calmly discussing how y'all can live together better, or to relocate one...
...or the other with the local Government's Assistance and Help in the cost of the new home. And who stays should be determined in extensive thought and common sense of the current circumstances of one or the other; Keep Calm and take your time thinking about it, or seek...
...help from a local impartial third party to hear both sides, and make a fair and reasonably sound final decision on who stays and who leaves.

Another detail is the people who end up staying, while their self-counterparts either merges with them or dies.

REMEMBER, these people have had the MOST Similar or Matching Personality Aspects and Memories, so those of you all who are friends or family with these people are capable of picking up where they left off. Otherwise, if the individual(s) have no memory of you or the situation...
...that led y'all to become family or friends, it is possible to make a fresh start on y'all's relationship, or, if you feel it needed or choose so, to simply let them go and move forward with your life. My deepest condolences to those of you who end up letting them go.
Locations and Local Government: Now, for example, whatever city it was in New Jersey that has now become Gotham City, For Real, your home will have the similar or new address, with the obvious difference being that it's in Gotham City, and possibly the Zip Code.
You will likely need to fill out a change of address form to update that, at your local Post Office, and update anything else with your new address. The Local Government were your are is likely to pick up where it left off and resume work as quickly as possible.
Even the White House in DC will end up taking their time picking things back up and adapting to the Donald Trump of C-197 resuming work as the POTUS of the updated United States. The same will apply to the Nations and Countries with their respective World Leaders.
But, in due time, short or long, after getting everything re-situated, Everyone on the Earth will have become used to being around everyone who they had considered before as "Fictional Characters", and accepting them as the real people, anthropomorphic animals, intelligent...
...beings from other dimensions or planets, and so forth, as y'all had before with everyone else before the #DimensionalMerge. And life and time will continue marching forward and onward.
Another topic: us Creators/Artists/Authors and any and all Future Creations and Edits; will those Creations take place and happen on our Earth then, and our OCs being born here as well? That outcome is likely, so unless y'all had Previously, Specifically Drawn/Written...
...your OCs and their events in an alternate timeline, location, planet, dimension, galaxy, or so forth: EXERCISE CAUTION as this will not only affect the local area and space around your own Self-Counterpart, but Yourself, as well. Thinking it is one thing; Bringing it to...
...confirmed fruition is another, Especially if you take pen to page. Because, once you've completed that story, or even a word in a sentence with that ending punctuation at the end; moreover completing it by Signing Your Name on the completed piece; you will have set a...
...chain of events that will make that happen at least around your OC, or yourself. Either that, OR a new Dimension for all that to happen outside of our combined Earth could be opened/created in all of this. Personally, I Want to Encourage Staying Creative and Creating, anyway.
SOO Much is still yet to be Final and Determined sound and well by the Cosmos and Fate of events. We will be able to figure this part out better later on after the #DimensionalMerge.
PHEW! That is a whole Meta Mind-Blower, right there. My sequence of thoughts have ended there, so I do believe that should be just about everything covered for The Merge Survival Guide. Any questions, please leave and comment to @SonichuMerch,...
...and the most Frequently Asked Questions will be relayed to me, and I, or Magi-Chan, will personally answer them. Also, you all can clear your thoughts and take deep breaths in a short meditate to ask your question in your mind and the wisdom of the Cosmos will respond.
Thank You All for heeding our warnings and information on the #DimensionalMerge. All of you, Stay Safe, Well and Creative, and Remember to THINK and Keep COMMON SENSE in your minds and hearts.

‚ö°Ô∏èüíô‚ö°Ô∏è

  1. 1218C197
